column4: ok im in linux now.. and able to fix my printer issues.. now how can i change the screen resolution to 1440x900 do i need to install driver for nvidia
Yes, go to System -> Administration -> Restricted Driver Manager
so WOW & ragnarok 2 cant  be played in linux?? coz its not on list there
No, they just aren't native, I know that WoW at least can be played with wine
